items.title: The Godfather
items.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

items.title: Forrest Gump
items.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

items.title: Pulp Fiction
items.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

items.title: Inception
items.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

items.title: The Shawshank Redemption
items.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.title: The Dark Knight
items.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

items.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
items.description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

items.title: Fight Club
items.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
items.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

items.title: Interstellar
items.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

items.title: The Matrix
items.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

items.title: Schindler's List
items.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

items.title: Saving Private Ryan
items.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

items.title: Jurassic Park
items.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

items.title: Gladiator
items.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

items.title: Titanic
items.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

items.title: The Lion King
items.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

items.title: The Avengers
items.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

items.title: Inglourious Basterds
items.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

items.title: The Shining
items.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

items.title: Psycho
items.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

items.title: Toy Story
items.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

items.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
items.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

items.title: Casablanca
items.description: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not he should help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.

items.title: The Silence of the Lambs
items.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

items.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
items.description: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

items.title: The Departed
items.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

items.title: Alien
items.description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

items.title: The Godfather: Part II
items.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

items.title: Back to the Future
items.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

items.title: Jaws
items.description: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

items.title: The Incredibles
items.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

items.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
items.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

items.title: The Pianist
items.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

items.title: The Dark Knight Rises
items.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

items.title: Die Hard
items.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

items.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
items.description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

items.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
items.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

items.title: The Social Network
items.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea.

items.title: Gone with the Wind
items.description: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

items.title: Up
items.description: Seventy-eight year old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his home equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

items.title: The Great Dictator
items.description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

items.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
items.description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

items.title: Inside Out
items.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

items.title: Coco
items.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

items.title: The Big Lebowski
items.description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

items.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
items.description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

items.title: City of God
items.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

items.title: Amélie
items.description: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

items.title: Whiplash
items.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
